activities:
Bronto is an online email services provider that provides services to our clients pursuant to Bronto’s customer agreements. Bronto processes data provided by our customers, which includes personal information (and any data that customers enter into our solution) to send electronic messages to EU and Switzerland. 
 
Bronto collects, transfers and uses personal information through its website from users, actual and prospective customers and business partners for sales, billing, business partner recruitment, and marketing purposes as permissible under applicable law.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization name, client contact name, client contact address, client contact phone, client email, billing address, credit card number, invoices. Includes manually processed data.
